info.name: Contact Form API Test
info.description: Test collection for EZ Labs Front-End Intern Assignment - Contact Form API Integration

request.description: Test case for successful form submission with all required fields filled correctly.
Another test case with different valid user data to verify consistent API behavior.
Test case for empty form submission. This should fail validation on the client-side in the actual application, but we're testing the API response here.
Test case with missing email field. Client-side validation should prevent this, but testing API response.
Test case with invalid email format. The React application prevents this with Zod validation, but we test the API's handling of invalid data.
Test case with special characters and international characters in the name field.
Test case with a long message to ensure the API can handle extended text content.
